data.name: DEVOUR: Supporter Edition
data.detailed_description:
If you're interested in access to awesome, unique DEVOUR content, you will love the DEVOUR: Supporter Edition! Purchasing this DLC is also a great way to support the DEVOUR development process, so that we can continue to bring you new and exciting content.

DEVOUR: Supporter Edition contains the following:

Kai's "Pyromaniac" Outfit



Anna's "Fallen Angel" Outfit



Frostbite Flashlight



6 stunning 4K desktop wallpaper images


3 variations featuring Anna and 3 variations with the classic DEVOUR logo.

Original DEVOUR painting by Jarel Threat (Digital Copy)


High-resolution (3900x5400px) digital image. Perfect for printing!

Official 26-page Game Design Document (Signed Digital Copy)


High-resolution PDF digitally signed by the entire development team.

Official map floorplans


Several high-resolution concept designs for each map are included.

data.short_description: If you're interested in access to awesome, unique DEVOUR content, you will love the DEVOUR: Supporter Edition! Purchasing this DLC is also a great way to support the DEVOUR development process, so that we can continue to bring you new and exciting content.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Thai, Portuguese, Czech, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB Video RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Video RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
